attributes.action: Make 'extended project' optional at Blessed George Napier School
attributes.additional_details: I want HM Government to take action against Blessed George Napier School, Banbury, for making the 'Extended Project' qualification compulsory to students. The general view of the students is that it may be hindering success in their chosen subjets that they require to further themselves in Higher Education and employment after A-Levels.
